ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
ygData.msgSnippet: When I got Cantata (34), the necro I sometimes duo with, practically peed himself.  What that has done to our down time is pretty crazy. Has anyone done a
ygData.messageBody:
When I got Cantata (34), the necro I sometimes duo with, practically peed
himself. What that has done to our down time is pretty crazy.
Has anyone done a study on the mana regen rates between just singing clarity
and doing cantata with 2 clarity pulses? I'd like to see that. Maybe I'll
do it...

Elfson Allegro 51 Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 1:35 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"


> wow I'd love to meet that warrior of yours 8)
>
> On the bright side one of my best friends has started up a necro and is
> loving it (he used to be a warrior when i used to play my necro) so I
doubt
> he'll ever nag me for mana but for regens instead. Great stories Elf, I
> think I'm gonna start being group leader from now on 8)
